title: Edhirthu Nil Lyrics Biriyani Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Edhirthu Nil
Singer: G. V. Prakash Kumar, D. Imman,
Vijay Antony, S. Thaman
Movie: Biriyani
Music: Yuvan
Lyrics: Gangai Amaran.

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Thirumbi pogum dhisai
edhu therindhadhu maaripogaadhey
varuvadhai nee edhir kondu paarthidu
kolai aagaadhey

Un ila ratham adhu nitham, kodhikattum
enniya ennam adhu endrum jeikatum
thappaedhum illai
ne appanuku pillai

adhirthu nill, edhiriye illaai.
nambikkai kol, thadaigale illai
Nimidam yen, nodigale podhum
ninaipadhe vettribthaaney
elundhuvaa ... laayillaa
laayilallaa...

Ellam tharuvadhai yetrukol
kaal padhivadhai aliyadhu
vaan velivarai thottusel
un parambarai mudivedhu

Vilidhadhum thoonga thoondaadhu
elundhapin viludhal aagaadhu
vaaraadha pozhudhu
varugira pozhudhu
vaarik kol

Vaaraadha ondrai tharukira neram
po parandhu vandhe irundhirupom
uyarndhu

adhirthu nill, edhiriye illaai.
nambikkai kol, thadaigale illai
Nimidam yen, nodigale podhum
ninaipadhe vettribthaaney
elundhuvaa

Ondrae uruven ennikol
indre nijamena etrukkol
anbaal inaidhadhu vilagaadhu
adhuve iraiarul..kol

Ninaithadhai nadathi munneru
nilaikattum namadhu, varalaaru
yedhaanapodhum vidigira pozhudhu
maarumo...
yellaarukum ingae ini varum kaalam
aanandham, aaraambam
idhu nirandharam naathaan

Thirumbi pogum dhisai
edhu therindhadhu maaripogaadhey
varuvadhai nee edhir kondu paarthidu
kolai aagaadhey

Un ila ratham adhu nitham, kodhikattum
enniya ennam adhu endrum jeikatum
thappaedhum illai
ne appanuku pillai

adhirthu nill, edhiriye illaai.
nambikkai kol, thadaigale illai
Nimidam yen, nodigale podhum
ninaipadhe vettribthaaney
elundhuvaa ... laayillaa
laayilallaa...

ninaipadhe vettribthaaney
elundhuvaa
